targets.expr: avg by (method, remote, code) (ig_http_client_response_time_seconds{pod=~"$ig_pod", remote=~"$request_remote", method=~"$http_method", code=~"$http_code"})

targets.expr: avg by (method, remote, code) (rate(ig_http_client_response_time_seconds{pod=~"$ig_pod", remote=~"$request_remote", method=~"$http_method", code=~"$http_code"}[$time_interval]))

$time_interval rate of time to process requests and responses in decorated filters and their downstream filters and handler
$time_interval rate count of requests and responses processed in decorated filters and their downstream filters and handler
Mean time to process requests and responses in decorated filters and its downstream filters and handler
$time_interval rate of mean time to process requests and responses in decorated filters and its downstream filters and handler
$active_quantile quantile of time to process requests and responses in decorated filters and its downstream filters and handler
IG Timer metrics for total processing time in decorated filters (elapsed)
$time_interval rate of time to process requests and responses in decorated objects
$time_interval rate count of requests and responses  processed in decorated objects
Mean time to process requests and responses in decorated objects
$time_interval rate of mean time to process requests and responses in decorated objects
$active_quantile quantile of time (sec) to process requests and responses in decorated objects
IG Timer metrics for processing time in the decorated filters (internal)
$time_interval rate of time to process requests and responses in filters and handlers that are downstream of decorated objects
$time_interval rate count of requests and responses processed in filters and handlers that are downstream of decorated objects
Mean time to process requests and responses in filters and handlers that are downstream of decorated objects
$time_interval rate of mean time to process requests and responses in filters and handlers that are downstream of decorated objects
$active_quantile quantile of time to process requests and responses in filters and handlers that are downstream of decorated objects
IG Timer metrics for processing time in downstream elements of decorated filters (downstream)
$time_interval rate of time to process requests and responses in decorated handlers
$time_interval rate of the count of requests and responses in decorated handlers
Mean time to process the request and response in the decorated handler
$time_interval rate of mean time to process the request and response in the decorated handler
$active_quantile quantile of time to process the request and response in the decorated handler
IG Timer metrics for decorated handler objects
